mapper.select:
select count(t.id) count, t.shiftno shiftNo, a.name name,to_char(t.create_time,'MM/dd') createTime, to_char(tw.work_date,'MM/dd') as workDate from tb_quality_tracing t left join tm_nc_group a on t.tm_nc_group_id = a.id left join tm_worktime tw on tw.id = t.tm_work_time_id where 1=1 and tw.work_date is not null and t.MARK_FOR_DELETE != 1
and t.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and t.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by a.name, t.shiftno,to_char(tw.work_date,'MM/dd'),to_char(t.create_time,'MM/dd') order by workDate

select count(t.id) count, a.name name from tb_quality_tracing t left join tm_nc_group a on t.tm_nc_group_id = a.id where 1=1 and t.MARK_FOR_DELETE != 1
and t.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and t.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by a.name order by count desc

select count(b.name) count, b.name name, max(info_sources) infoSources from tb_quality_tracing a left join tm_nc b on a.tm_nc_id = b.id where b.name is not null and info_sources is not null and a.MARK_FOR_DELETE != 1
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by b.name order by count desc

select tab.minute MINUTE,tab.count COUNT,tab.abnormalSource ABNORMALSOURCE from ( select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a, tm_uloc b where a.tm_uloc_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_code and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'L' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source union all select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource from tm_code_rule t, tb_equipment_status a, tm_equipment b where a.tm_equipment_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_number and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'E' and t.distinguish = 'Y' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source union all select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a where t.plc_code = a.station_state and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'W' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source )tab order by MINUTE desc

select tab.abnormalSource ABNORMALSOURCE,tab.codeDesc CODEDESC,tab.count COUNT,tab.minute MINUTE from (select count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource, '线体源'||':'|| t.code_desc codeDesc, TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a, tm_uloc b where a.tm_uloc_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_code and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'L' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source, t.code_desc union all select count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource, '设备源'||':'|| t.code_desc codeDesc, TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute from tm_code_rule t, tb_equipment_status a, tm_equipment b where a.tm_equipment_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_number and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'E' and t.distinguish = 'Y' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source, t.code_desc union all select count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource, '作业源'||':'|| t.code_desc codeDesc, TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a where t.plc_code = a.station_state and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'W' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source, t.code_desc) tab

select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource, t.code_desc codeDesc from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a, tm_uloc b where a.tm_uloc_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_code and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'L' and a.is_rest='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source, t.code_desc order by minute desc

select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource, t.code_desc codeDesc from tm_code_rule t, tb_equipment_status a, tm_equipment b where a.tm_equipment_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_number and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'E' and t.distinguish = 'Y' and a.is_rest ='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source, t.code_desc order by minute desc

select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, t.data_source abnormalSource, t.code_desc codeDesc from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a where t.plc_code = a.station_state and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'W' and a.is_rest ='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by t.data_source, t.code_desc order by minute desc

select sum(tab.minute) MINUTE,sum(tab.count)COUNT,tab.createTime from ( select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, to_char(a.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') createTime from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a, tm_uloc b where a.tm_uloc_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_code and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'L' and a.is_rest ='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by to_char(a.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') union all select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count, to_char(a.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') createTime from tm_code_rule t, tb_equipment_status a, tm_equipment b where a.tm_equipment_id = b.id and t.plc_code = b.no || ' ' || a.status_number and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'E' and t.distinguish = 'Y' and a.is_rest ='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by to_char(a.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') union all select TRUNC(SUM((a.update_time - a.create_time) * 24 * 60 * 60) / 60, 2) minute, count(t.id) count,to_char(a.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') createTime from tm_code_rule t, tb_uloc_status a where t.plc_code = a.station_state and a.finish_time is not null and t.data_source = 'W' and a.is_rest ='N'
and a.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and a.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by to_char(a.create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') )tab group by tab.createTime

select tu.no as ULOC_NO, tab.TIME_OFF as TIME_OFF, tab.TIME_OUT as TIME_OUT from ( select t.tm_uloc_id as tm_uloc_id, count(1) as TIME_OFF, TRUNC(sum(t.front_wait_duration+t.back_wait_duration)/60,2) as TIME_OUT from TB_PRODUCT_STATION t where 1=1
and t.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and t.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and(t.front_wait_duration > 0 or t.back_wait_duration > 0) group by t.tm_uloc_id )tab left join tm_uloc tu on tab.tm_uloc_id = tu.id order by TIME_OUT desc

select
tu.no as ULOC_NO,
TRUNC(sum(to_number(tus.update_time-tus.create_time)* 24 * 60 * 60)/60,2) as TIME_OUT,
count(*) as TIME_OFF from tb_uloc_status tus left join tm_uloc tu on tus.tm_uloc_id = tu.id where 1 = 1 and tus.tm_work_time_id is not null and tus.create_time is not null and tus.update_time is not null and tus.is_rest ='N'
and substr(tus.station_state,#{checkBit},1) = 1
and tus.create_time >= to_date(#{createTimeStart},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
and tus.create_time <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi')
group by tu.no order by TIME_OUT desc

select (max(t.ac_energy) - min(t.ac_energy)) AC_ENERGY, max(t.device_energy) - min(t.device_energy) DEVICE_ENERGY, max(t.light_energy) - min(t.light_energy) LIGHT_ENERGY, to_char(t.create_time, '${timeFormate}') TIME from TKS_ENERGY t where 1=1
and to_date(to_char(t.create_time,'${timeFormate}'), '${timeFormate}') >= to_date(#{createTimeStart}, '${timeFormate}')
and to_date(to_char(t.create_time, '${timeFormate}'), '${timeFormate}') <= to_date(#{createTimeEnd}, '${timeFormate}')
group by to_char(t.create_time, '${timeFormate}') order by to_char(t.create_time, '${timeFormate}')
